text: Epikouri was a Greek band formed in 1980 as backing vocalists for Anna Vissi when they represented their country in Eurovision Song Contest 1980 with the song "Autostop." The entry finished in 13th place with 30 points. The band was formed by Achilleas Michailidis, Zaharias Michailidis and Eva Tselidou. The group did not perform again with Anna Vissi after the contest. title: Epikouri
